Package com.verilion.display.jsp.tags

Class Summary
ActiveUserCountTag TagLib to display banner
BannerTag TagLib to display banner
BaseTag Base java tag
BlogTag TagLib to display Blog page, and editor (if you're signed in)
BuiltByTag Builds generated comment tag
DisplayMessageTag TagLib to display message in session on page.
GetNewMessageCountTag TagLib to display count for unread messages
GoogleAdTag TagLib to display google ad
LatestNewsTag TagLib to display latest news.
MenuJsTag TagLib to create javascript for special menus, if required
MenuTag TagLib to display Main Menu.
ModuleTag TagLib to display Modules.
QBETag Displays form to perform query against some table(s) or views in the database.
QueryFormTag Displays form to perform query against some table(s) or views in the database.
RandomImageTag Displays random image from list.
RewriteUrlTag Rewrites URL to the format necessary to invoke controller servlet.
StoreItemDetail TagLib to display item (browse or detail).
StoreMenuTag TagLib to display menu for shopping.
StoreShoppingCartTag TagLib to display menu for shopping.
TabPageTag Top level tab page tag
YearsDDLB TagLib to display ddlb of years.
